title: Sensex, Nifty wobbly; Hind Zinc, SBI, Force Motors most active
description: Asian Paints, SBI, Tata Motors, HUL and Maruti Suzuki are top gainers while ONGC, Axis Bank, MM, Bajaj Auto and Hero MotoCorp are major losers in the Sensex.
text: Ravi Ananthanarayan Deputy Executive Editor | Moneycontrol

title: Moneycontrol Exclusive: Govt plans overhaul of tax administration for smooth GST rollout
description: The government has readied plans for a major change in Indiaâs tax administration structure, including overhauling the Central Board of Excise and Customs (CBEC) to ensure a glitch-free roll-out of a nation-wide goods and services tax (GST).
text: Ravi Ananthanarayan Deputy Executive Editor | Moneycontrol

title: Bond bull market may pause but is far from over: Expert
description: The benchmark 10-year government-security yield remained stuck in 8-7.5 percent range through all of 2015 and half of 2016, moving lower to sub-7 percent only when the RBI promised in April to reduce the system's liquidity deficit. The yield may now fall more.
text: A collection of the most-viewed Moneycontrol videos. Trade setup for Monday: Top 15 things to know before Opening Bell Ladies & Gentlemen, The Weekend! These Nifty Next 50 index stocks are fund managers’ favorites; Should you invest? Ideas For Profit | Sharda Cropchem

title: Automation threatens 69% jobs in India: World Bank
description: "In large parts of Africa, it is likely that technology could fundamentally disrupt this pattern. Research based on World Bank data has predicted that the proportion of jobs threatened in India by automation is 69 percent, in China it is 77 percent and in Ethiopia, the percentage of jobs threatened by automation is 85 percent," he said.
text: Ravi Ananthanarayan Deputy Executive Editor | Moneycontrol
